acheron.name: Acheron
acheron.title: Nihility Emanator
acheron.bio: A drifter shrouded in mystery. She claims to be a Galaxy Ranger, but her power far exceeds that of ordinary beings. Wields a blade that can sever anything, even the concept of existence itself.

kafka.name: Kafka
kafka.title: Destiny's Slave
kafka.bio: A member of the Stellaron Hunters. Elegant, poised, and intelligent. She has the ability to make anyone do her bidding, though she only exercises this power over those she deems 'deserving.'

blade.name: Blade
blade.title: Immortal Broken Blade
blade.bio: A former member of the High-Cloud Quintet of the Xianzhou Luofu. He was granted immortality against his will and now seeks death, while being bound to serve the Stellaron Hunters.

silver_wolf.name: Silver Wolf
silver_wolf.title: Universe's Best Hacker
silver_wolf.bio: A genius hacker who views the universe as one giant game. She can manipulate reality through her hacking, removing enemies' advantages at will.

march_7th.name: March 7th
march_7th.title: Ice-Preserved Beauty
march_7th.bio: A young woman who was found encased in ice and has no memory of her past. She's energetic, positive, and loves taking photos. Now travels with the Astral Express.

dan_heng.name: Dan Heng
dan_heng.title: Cold Dragon
dan_heng.bio: A cold and reserved young man who works as the archivist of the Astral Express. He carries the sin of his past incarnation and seeks to atone.

himeko.name: Himeko
himeko.title: Navigator of Astral Express
himeko.bio: The navigator of the Astral Express. She repaired the train and invited new passengers to join her journey among the stars. A mature and reliable leader.

welt.name: Welt Yang
welt.title: Former Sovereign
welt.bio: A passenger from another world who once held the title of 'Sovereign.' He's experienced, wise, and serves as the senior member of the Astral Express crew.

trailblazer.name: Trailblazer
trailblazer.title: Stellaron Carrier
trailblazer.bio: The protagonist who was awakened on the Herta Space Station with a Stellaron embedded in their chest. Now travels with the Astral Express.

sunday.name: Sunday
sunday.title: Head of the Oak Family
sunday.bio: The head of the Oak Family and Robin's older brother. He orchestrates events from behind the scenes in Penacony, seeking to create an eternal dream.

robin.name: Robin
robin.title: Galaxy's Voice
robin.bio: A famous singer known across the galaxy. She's Sunday's sister and possesses a pure heart, spreading joy through her music.

aventurine.name: Aventurine
aventurine.title: IPC Senior Manager
aventurine.bio: A senior manager of the IPC's Strategic Investment Department. He's a gambler at heart, always betting on the most dangerous odds.

topaz.name: Topaz
topaz.title: IPC Strategic Investment Manager
topaz.bio: A senior manager of the Strategic Investment Department of the IPC. She's accompanied by her trusty partner Numby, a Warp Trotter.

jingliu.name: Jingliu
jingliu.title: Sword Champion of Luofu
jingliu.bio: Former Sword Champion of the Luofu who fell to mara. She was once part of the High-Cloud Quintet alongside Blade.

jing_yuan.name: Jing Yuan
jing_yuan.title: General of the Cloud Knights
jing_yuan.bio: The Divine Foresight, one of the Seven Arbiter-Generals of the Xianzhou Alliance. Despite his lazy demeanor, he's a brilliant strategist.

fu_xuan.name: Fu Xuan
fu_xuan.title: Master Diviner
fu_xuan.bio: The head of the Divination Commission of the Xianzhou Luofu. She can foresee the future and protects her allies from harm.

sparkle.name: Sparkle
sparkle.title: Masked Fool
sparkle.bio: A member of the Masked Fools who can see through disguises and illusions. Her true identity is shrouded in mystery.

black_swan.name: Black Swan
black_swan.title: Memokeeper
black_swan.bio: A Memokeeper of the Garden of Recollection. She collects and stores memories, weaving them into her dance.
